content: this is a perfect project for advanced beginners who want to spice up their wardrobe and make a soft cozy oversized garment thanks so much to hobbii who kindly sent me this rainbow sock wool 8-ply to try out rainbow sock wool is spun from a blend of wool and polyamide so it s really soft but with that rustic feel of wool i love for an oversize size s i ve used - almost 2 balls of colour 06 brown - almost 2 balls of colour 05 sand - almost 1 ball of colour 02 cream - almost 1 ball of colour 30 burnt orange if you are interested in purchasing this yarn which comes in 40 beautiful colours follow this link and let me know what colours you picked https //hobbii mvk co/2dnqh - i ve created the design from start to end so please don t copy that it is not allowed to distribute the pattern in any way for free or for sale you are welcome to sell as many of the finished products as you wish but i do ask that you credit me as the designer on your social media and provide a link to my youtube channel if you re selling online ©bloodimaryart all rights reserved
